
- git logger -> load history into json model
	{
	'commit-hash': 'H', 
	'parent-hash': 'T',
	'author-name': 'an',
	'author-email': 'ae',
	'author-date': 'at',
	'committer-name': 'cn',
	'committer-email': 'ce',
	'committer-date': 'ct',
	'encoding': 'e',
	'subject': 's',
	'sanitized-subject': 'f',
	'body': 'b',
	}




- git parser -> parse history and figure out branches, relations
	- serverside


- renderer - render history
	- render branches
		- add button to checkout
	- render commit
		- plugin able. add button for merge, 
	- render relation
	


https://github.com/nickola/web-console
https://github.com/jcubic/jquery.terminal
